lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, but it has to switch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So those who missed that, we finally, finally got them back up in stock on the website, so if you're looking for those, they're available.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These European models are in these smoking hot-- Oh, who? These European models?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else, are we good to jump into this game for tonight?

lines.name: SCANLAN
lines.text: I'm afraid, I'm afraid we'll all die if you don't help.

lines.name: KAYLEE
lines.text: I'm going to very quickly, and with her help, usher everybody back into this back stair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, what can I do?" You can throw your voice, I've seen you do it once, right.

lines.name: GROG
lines.text: As the essence of minor illusion, it is a very, very simple illusion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Almost like a heat distortion that kind of just scatters out from her hand and outside of this central illusion, you hear a voice, comes booming forward, "I--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Which main gate?" I don't know, do I know what it looks like?

lines.name: KAYLEE
lines.text: Is there any other preparation you guys wanna go through right now, or are you just waiting to see any sign of movement? Are we all, like, together or are we spread out across everything? We're birds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's my thing? I'm freaking out! Hide in plain sight?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, as part of that, I'll have you guys both roll stealth checks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you cast it before you arrived, or in the approach, so, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like that scene in Willow where--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to take it, just an occasional high-level...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, both of you guys roll perception checks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you could've been behind us and...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whispers inaudibly) Any products you want me to hawk while the camera's on us? Those shirts, man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These shirts? Not those shirts, these shirts! How do you wanna do this? How do you wanna do this? We already hawked those.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I cast Guardian of Faith near us, where we are hiding at the gate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you guys standing right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what, I'm gonna pause, I'm gonna pause.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, so, you guys, what are you doing? (mimicking birds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I'm on the wall, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is Scanlan listening to you right now? Scanlan, can you hear me? Scanlan? There's no response.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think he's too far away, you guys, I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're using your father, right? Your father is dead, right? Your dad's dead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know how well this is working-- Just a pro-tip, Vax, what would you say is the number one thing to keep in mind when fighting someone like me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's our plan B in case Zanror never comes out?

lines.name: VEX
lines.text: We go in and we kill everyone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The one I recognize because I, the only one I've met.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to stealth, I kind of want to hunker down against the wall and stealth.

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: Guys, if no one comes towards the gate in the next five, ten minutes--

lines.name: KEYLETH
lines.text: Well, all right, I hope so, but if nobody's here in ten, I think we gotta go in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, as you step out, they all immediately put their hands out and stop and to the guards, shout out, "You, who goes there?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They just plummet, screaming, down-- Two managed not to fall?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are the best at planning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And if I look at the sheets here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That means toast for any of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, you hear a horrible scream and a crunch sound as they all, those that fell are unconscious or currently completely unable--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, they don't even have a save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking down there would be terrible right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the next one? Um, that's 17, 27, 30 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does that drop count as a kill? Do I get a grit point back for that, or no?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 34 turns to 68, plus the bonus is 70, 74.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, I should've done that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no way I could use my third shot really quick, is there? Uh, no, you're too focused on the thing in front you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You suffer nine points of piercing damage as its claws dig into you and attempt to throw you from the top of the wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 19, yeah! (applause) As you're spiraling backwards, seeing the eagle, you look behind you to the ground, close your eyes, swoop upward into the form of a raven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) Kill him, Grog! Kill him, Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is anybody else doing anything right now on this turn? Or are we just waiting to see what happens here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasps) As Pike steps out from the high grass, in this--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go ahead, roll damage for that attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage on that one as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's the eagles? The eagles aren't too far from your side right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And where's the pit? The pit is about 10 feet behind the guy who's standing, actually, I should probably put him there right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, I'd like to keep an eye out for the eagles as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's putting it down, he's putting it down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come on, invent a battle map, just like that, Matt! Come on! (laughing) (adventurous music)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a really good chasm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's all the dead bodies at the bottom of it? Yeah, can you draw detailed dead bodies? (laughing) Can you just grade it a little bit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you like to draw, or sketch, or just doodle?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are the twins right now? Twins would be back here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike would be off to the side here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm gonna keep an eye out for the eagles, too, so...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody keep commenting if you see something-- Where's the eagles?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How does he get four attacks? Is he a fighter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just hacks into you (grunts) and looks forward and sees you barely moved by this flurry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so I'm gonna fucking throw a knife at him if he does anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hunter's Mark on that fellow there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And keeping an eye on the hawks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want to bullrush Suda and drive him back towards...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of them, all the feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You push him five feet away from you, or prone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try and shove him out, you could grapple and try to drag him with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the tension and the drama!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, those are so many! 5, 10, 15...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm gonna cast Sanctuary on Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Usually, your bonus action, you've already used your turn to hold your action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever you want, whatever you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bonus action is used on your turn, and the holding your action is kind of that one thing that keeps over, so...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel a little sink of pain as it kind of cuts through some of the leather, but even the belt itself deflects most of the attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look over and say, "Sit down, son, before you hurt yourself." (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, that being said, the guy who's on the ground now-- any of you guys wanna do anything at this point? I'll shoot an arrow at the other guy standing there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Am I back to town yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is going to be a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I have to roll an athletics check?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What little glint of daylight even makes the bottom area, 'cause it's far out of your range for dark vision, you just see enough of a movement on the bottom, and then no movement whatsoever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You Wile E. Coyote'd that guy! Oh, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I see them, do I see the group? We've cleared the area, more or less, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whoever was set to go to that side of the gate to check it out--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't drop it in and out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As some time has passed, you guys have waited it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The barricaded door is still slightly ajar, as closing it would make quite a bit of noise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they were motley, and they involved half-orcs and things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't, listen, you can't hate away me being your father, all right? I will always be the guy, no matter how much you curse my name and wish I was not part of you, my blood is inside of you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's this one kind of younger man in his mid-teens, he's like, "This is amazing!" (grunts) And they're also making the noises at each other, like for a brief moment, all of the fear subsides as they're, for the moment, getting into the play of acting like a half-orc, and then they all get serious again and look to you and Kaylee and Kaylee goes, "All right then, follow me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I swoop down a little closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see this roving band of half-orcs now that are heading southward of the town in a cluster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys continue to move--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, we have to follow Kevdak's orders.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please, please, God! Make another deception check with disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Gotta get there before they "run out of cucumber sandwiches!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He goes, "All right, we'll send a few more men your way."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I don't trust it." "Hold on one second!" And I'm gonna cast Hold Person on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have a report yet? Keyleth? I'm getting nervous about Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I hear him? Am I close enough by yet? I'd say by now you've returned in raven form, you can hear him over the earpiece.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's been how long since we've seen him since he went in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can either get out ahead of them, or try and wait and see if...

lines.name: VAX
lines.text: Were they headed this way? They were headed this way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They might have him held prisoner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why didn't we give a gatestone? We should always give--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought he was just going to the gate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, can you-- Scanlan, can you hear us at all?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of them just turns around, heads back to the center of town.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Way up high in the sky on this one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, can I get in on that as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the first, all righty, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you, this is with a disadvantage, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At which point, its form goes (wooshing noise) into what you see to be a female elven form (gasps) and then just drops straight down for 100 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That still sounds pretty bad! Really bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys watch as she just goes (falling sound, thud) (laughing) Like, there's a little--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that other one still looking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Out of bad news range? Uh, no, still within bad news range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it, Percy! I'm gonna, I'm gonna, not only am I gonna take a shot--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth runs towards the girl who fell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you start heading in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm gonna do a ring shot, we'll see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think she-- It says she gets knocked prone, so I don't know what you want to call that for something flying, but-- That's, she's falling now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you taking your second shot? Uh, sure, I'll just take, and for this one, I'm gonna be an asshole and just take a sharpshooter shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Uh, that's a-- I'll say before you commit, I'll say this has disadvantage because it went from flying at a smooth pace to plummeting and you have to quickly--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasps) Giant eagle AC is not that great, man! That's so sad! Oh God, I feel bad now! (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, they don't know who's coming, at least.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we close enough to loot that first body? Sure, you guys--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I was headed that way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Moving around the chasm you create, you head inside the western gate of Westruun at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The rest of the body's kind of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like the body, does it appear to be any druid related to the Ashari clan? Looking it over, make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a less-refined version of what the Ashari people learn and teach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Non-magical? Non-magical, from what you can gather.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because there are large, large city street gaps that are, like, 25 to 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you go ahead and you get up with him and you can go-- the two of you can start, like, parkouring off the rooftop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can't you just sit on the broom with me? What is going on, are Grog and Pike and I just supposed to stand over here by the gate? Are you guys gonna head off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we had a plan, and then we didn't have a plan, so we have like...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just gonna keep hoofing it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's it going? Did my plan work?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, did your plan work?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If there was only six, it worked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And in a sense, that was my mission, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what, we killed nine of them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A distraction from their terrible, terrible lives.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What should I do, where should I go, who should I kill?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you see around you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, hi, hi, this is me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a wine cellar or door or something that we can beat in, or a window? There are windows, you don't see a wine cellar in the immediate vicinity of this alleyway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll get it open quietly, I'm not gonna break anything!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The building appears to be vacant.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I just rolled a natural 20, so...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You wasted it on a window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the most deft unlocking you've ever done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It looks like it's been pretty heavily ransacked inside here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously? That's pretty much all my plans are, always.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's probably, I'd say the equivalent of about 1, 1:30.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we know where Wilhand's residence used to be?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's closer to where a lot of the temples and the worship areas are, and there is a small park there that was across the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or we can just walk right in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we trying to get?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We thought about seeing if maybe we could get to Wilhand's house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, he could provide a lot of help.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we go to the center of town -

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do we get out of this with the most - or sorry, with the least civilian casualties, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm not really thinking that far ahead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those of us with distance, we make, we find positions around the square.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this considered, like, a short rest? No, a short rest is like a half an hour to an hour of, like, intentional-- We can afford it, we can take that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A half hour? Will they start killing people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They don't even know where we are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, 30 minutes is nothing in a hostage situation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, let's take a short rest and we'll finish fleshing out this plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does anyone else need to heal up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wanna burn a hit dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that the Margrave house? Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what I would say is my plan, if you feel like walking, we can point guard you from a distance and make sure if anyone tries to attack.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we should try and probably have a few people on civilian duty as well, kind of like we did before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, 'cause after 24 hours, they get kicked out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we know the city this well, how far would you say is Wilhand's place from where we are now? I'd say it's about...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you like to go first and see if he's there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's choosing between the people in town or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, but we need Pike with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Either of which-- She has a fair point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you guys bee lining it, like straight through-- No, I was gonna say--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything we can give Grog to help him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't you bless him or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah? I can enhance his ability.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not actually wearing armor, it's designed for somebody who does not, so...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have to do it now? I would much rather you just did it on your own and maybe not tell me about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I could do it ahead of time-- Just do it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Give him a hug for good luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, now that we're done being all touchy-feely or whatever the hell that was--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then, in that case, I'll just, I'll sing you a rousing song to put you on your way! (clears throat) ♫ The stars at night ♫ Are big and bright (clapping) ♫ Deep in the beard of Strongjaw ♫ (laughing) Take your d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does it stack with Grog? Get Scanlan, Scanlan goes in combat a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I really, I don't need, I don't need any help, I'm fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just shut up and take it, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there some sort of-- Too late! Is there some sort of ritual that we need to do together to make this happen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you get those 15 extra hit points for the next eight hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything else you want to cast? No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, God, no! Are you guys following behind, or just letting him do his thing? We stealth, like-- We watch him leave.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Any other last-minute things you're gonna help Grog with? Or are we done?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We can stay close to him, though, right? I like that we managed to make, like, solving problems with violence into an ABC afternoon special, really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, the rest of you, go ahead and make your stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just beelining it straight to the center?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog is not going stealthy, or are you just walking through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys follow suit, dodging from alley to alley, Grog, you step into the main roadway-- okay, you want rooftop? You and Percy?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I think it was a one! (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your insolence amuses me." As you guys are kind of keeping back, I need everyone to make another stealth check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That guy tortures small animals, by the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you kind of glance over and look as the halfling and the female with the kind of hooked rapier both break off and begin heading back towards the alleyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two of them taking a turn--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I go for, you said you were taking the elf?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't want to be heard! (laughing) 7, 9, 10, 20, 30, 66.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Not necessary on the elf anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I still have the bonus action left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I want to Hunter's Mark, can I Hunter's Mark? Too late? Can I Hunter's Mark it? I'll say sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 24 for the first hit, no, 22 for the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have to sit through that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Cannot make any of these saves for the life of itself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One d8, so it's two d8 plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll- Twice, you roll two d8.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll a d8 and a d6.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At which point the spell fades as the life force of this halfling no longer holds sway and the body just crumples into a pile.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, wait, are they going to know that their two people are gone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What other choices did we have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, you take the whip and wrap it up real fast and kind of just attach it inside of your belt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, Pass Without a Trace is gone, you used Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He looks over to the other companion, "Go ahead and gather those men, "have them follow you into the alley." Then the other individual walks towards the alley and starts talking to the other goliaths, they go ahead and take some of the people that they're holding by the arms, lift them up over their shoulder, and you now have roughly six individuals, four of which are goliath, now joining up for a total of seven, and they're all heading back towards the ally way,

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hostages heading towards you just run, just run and hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the elf who continues to walk forward with you is back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys begin to vanish, make one more stealth check to see if you leave any tracks behind or any followable trace.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we still have Pass Without a -

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a set you never quite picked up from Gilmore.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought we had it already.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter) He's got it all under his arm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if that's a real thing...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He probably has a magic vault.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do not remember that at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just don't remember that either, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And kind of stand up and look.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hold her by both hands and I Dimension Door us to the rooftop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Open the door, do the top one, do the bottom lock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Acrobatics? I'm just going to go backwards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they all step in and look about--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter) They move past and all of you companions are currently gone, you're by yourself hiding this big underneath a doorway in your elemental form, what do you want to do? They're gone though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've moved past you, yeah, they did not notice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so (imitates wind), this little burst of wind that comes up to the rooftop, and as you get up there, you can see a couple roofs over, a couple of dots, the rest of your companions that are slowing making their way along the road.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, you guys make your way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you see, about every five or six of these, there is a head adorning it, that has been just kind of wedge on, pushed as a warning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to know the answer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I recognized a couple earlier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As you go through the first set, already you can see the cluster of goliaths and as well as individuals that step forward and are like, "Hey, who are you bringing here?" And the elf behind you says, "Apparently a blood relative of Kevdak's." "Is this true?" And a few of the Goliaths step forward and say, "Oh, I doubt that." And the one on the other side says, "Blood relative, the only one is up inside." He steps forward and you see the next Goliath that you recognize, this is one of the older seers, who has one eye that is completely clouded over white and is this kind of swollen, puss filled socket, that has been kind of perpetually infected over time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go ahead and fetch the town square if you could.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three days ago, we had dinner and he left the sushi bar with a big handful of toothpicks going, "I have plans for these." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true. I was like, did you steal toothpicks? He did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck that house, look at that house.

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Are we around, can we see any of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are watching this happen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, where are we? We're flanking, slowly but surely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm finding perch on a rooftop, so that I can deal with this shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm feel guilty for getting in a fight with my brother, right before I got up on the rooftop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the part where Matt plays dolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) All right, so where are you guys right now? You're watching this happen from a distant rooftop, right at the edge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it possible to move the camera to get the house? I was flanking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get on this balcony area?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over there? If you want to, it's going to be...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so you want to just glide into like, part of the stonework over here, or...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This, you guys would be coming from this direction here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take the 3 o'clock, if the house is 12, I'll take the 3 o'clock.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? Okay, so we'll say Percy is up on the roof area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a roof in this area?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who wants to be up there with Vex?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we dimension door up there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, Grog. With this, I want you to roll initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take Trinket out of the - If you'd like to, yeah, do you want to? Your call.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No Trinket, yes Trinket, what are you doing? Trinket is staying in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the DC on that one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It says within 30 feet frighten until end of next turn, wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my bonus action I yell "Coward!" And that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so for Kevdak's turn, Kevdak kind of realizing that he can't, he's not able to really move closer at this moment, kind of steps to the side here, guarding, kind of waiting...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: His version of fear was not digging in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just had to try and make it work at least once.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey man, at least I can say I didn't die without it working once.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And you see some of those tattoos, the black ink that goes across his chest, you see what looks like a bear that is hidden within the tattoo, that flares up with a flash of dark, deep red crimson energy and then fades back into the chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh and you have inspiration, that's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but this may not be the moment though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So the first two strikes, go ahead and roll for damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The impacts aren't doing as much damage as you hoped they would.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 28 to hit, sorry minus five, 23.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus an additional ten points of necrotic damage that you do not reduce.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While all the attention is focused on them, can I stealth down to the ground for a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, anybody else doing anything? Until we come back in the next round?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we do anything right now? Not until he says so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just want to duck, can I just duck in the building at least? Is that part of the stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Feeling the impact of those hits, and remembering our first encounter, I drop the firebrand war hammer, I rush Kevdak, and I want to try and rip away the blood ax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grab and you're face to face, it's right at your feet, you reach up and grab, with your fingers just barely wrapped around this ax's shaft right now, at the size that it's swollen, and you pull against him, I want you to go ahead and make a strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Land on the ground, you don't fall prone, but you're there and can probably grab your war hammer and pick it back up if you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why, what could that possibly mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's probably looking up the price of a mace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's an adventurer's kit run for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who did this illustration again? Oh yeah, I remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why don't you make an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does he get advantage on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Anyone else do anything else?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, can I do the same in my elemental form? Like, can I just mist kind of down around kind of right behind this asshole? What's up, I'm a spooky mist.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Would it take some time to get like behind that fountain?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's in the open, I asked about that first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You said I can attack from having a pole shoved through my shoulder?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But it's 30, so it's going to do an additional superiority die of damage on top of this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I need you to go ahead and make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be, this is going to be, with Great Weapon Master, that brings it to a 21.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to look at Kevdak and drop my arms to my side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And I'm going to say, "Clearly I've been a fool." "You are truly a foe to be reckoned with." And I will slowly drop to my knees.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to remember where we are, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll take a photograph, that's what iPhones are for.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think I can forget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we can have this up and ready for us to jump back in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to go right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The general consensus is it's 11 PM and we're keeping the crew here as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll pick up right at this ridiculous moment next week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like the battle of blue balls.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was not expecting that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we've got him right where I want him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just five more minutes, five more minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you at hit points wise? 133.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're fine, you could go for another six rounds!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has he done any damage to him at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But yeah, this is where that totem really shines.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I steal your Kevdak mini, he can't be killed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it Thursday yet? Have a good night.
